website_summaries.verdict: Perfect portability for taking to the pool, the patio, or out camping.
pros: Package comes with the pouf, a thick PVC liner, and foot pump
Light and easy to carry with a side handle
Inflates and deflates easily and quickly
The attractive, durable poly fabric looks good on the patio and is also easy to wipe clean
cons: Not the best pump, but does the job

customer_reviews.title: Great little Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this! I was looking at $75 ottomans and got this for Christmas. Loved it so much, I bought a second matching ottoman. It can be soft or hard depending on how much air you inflate with. I blew it up manually because I found the included pump cumbersome. I love these and the dogs love them!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Richardson-Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Well made with quality material
customer_reviews.text: We bought the inflatable Ottoman for use outdoors. After inflating it I have to admit it seems quite well made. We intend to use it outside but haven't had the chance to use it yet. A word of advice because it comes in two pieces the outer cover and the inner inflatable piece. Before inflating put the inner piece inside the cover because it will be almost impossible to place insert in the cover after being inflated. It should give many hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: splinter from nj

customer_reviews.title: Place black bladder inside outer cover before inflating
customer_reviews.text: I really like this inflatable stool. The only issue I had, was that I pumped up the inflatable part( which took awhile using the pump provided) before placing it in the outer cover, which when fully inflated will not fit . After deflating it a little so that it would fit, I just re-pumped it to fill the case and it worked fine. It is very lightweight, but sturdy. If you are keeping it outdoors, I would recommend either using the strap to run some cord to keep it from blowing away or adding weight to it some other way .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit in the cover very well unless under inflated Poor quality zipper broke within seconds of using this. I should’ve gotten a refund-don’t waste your own money. It’s a shame because ot would’ve been nice to have a washable one.
customer_reviews.author: Duzer

customer_reviews.title: Much Better than Styrofoam Filled Ottomans
customer_reviews.text: Colors are beautiful! Material is thick and should withstand the elements. And if not, I won’t be left with a mess of styrofoam balls to clean up like my previous ottomans. If you put the inter tube inside the cover before inflating, you will not have any problem zipping it. I was worried about them blowing away at the first gust of wind, but they fit snuggly under my chairs and they are not going anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent footstool!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use as a footstool on our patio and when we go camping. It is perfect! So easy to inflate - just put the inflatable liner inside the cover before inflating, then zip up when fully inflated. It seems quite sturdy and I love that I can just take the cover off and wash it when it gets dirty. We even had high winds this week and while it moved around a bit, it never turned over or became airborne. I will probably buy another one to leave in the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Jayeann R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up and very portable.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very quickly and set up in a few minutes. The outer woven fabric seems durable and we sprayed it with Scotchguard as we are using it in our travel trailer. You can sit on it, but we use it as an ottoman when sitting on the sofa. It is wider than we expected which was a pleasant surprise. You lay the inner blow up on the fabric and start pumping. It easily fills in the fabric form in a few minutes. Zip it up and you are ready. A little handle for carrying is on the side. We really like this! And when the trailer is in storage it deflates and goes in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Island Mom

customer_reviews.title: A pain to blow up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ottoman, but it is a pain to blow up. The hose is absolutely useless. I have two and both are useless. The tip does not poke through so you have use something else to push it before you can put the hose in. Then you have to hold it in as it continually pops out! One of the two continually loses air, and then I have to go through the hassle of trying to get it blown up again. I would buy more for my cottage, but its not worth the effort. They do look nice, but there has to be a better hose or way to blow up!
customer_reviews.author: cindy2366

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: The pump does not fit the product, AT ALL. It’s a nice pump but not to inflate Ottoman. Even though, I did not buy this for the pump that was just a bonus that ended up not working out. Regardless, once it is blown up it is awesome! It is comfy, easy to move, light weight and even has a convenient handle. Looks good with my outside furniture; spices things up.
customer_reviews.author: Brookie Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. They are attractive and convenient. Most chairs are too tall for my 5 ft 3 frame and so I like having my feet up on something. These can be tossed around the yard anywhere. And if figure if the blow up insert dies, I can fill the cover and make a bean bag out of it. But so far, too good. I am careful about leaving these out in the sun because the heat will cause the blow up part of expand. The little pump is useless. They are really cheap. SO I use my bike pump. Careful not to over inflate because then you can't sip up the cover.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schendel

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use!
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! I bought it for The interior of my daughters play set to cozy it up a little. She wants another one in there. I’m going to buy two for our patio as well. They sit a little low so keep that in mind. Measure your patio furniture before ordering. They don’t sit super low but don’t expect them to be level. Very sturdy. Easy to blow up. High quality fabric. Ours has gotten wet a lot the last month and still looks brand new. When you go to blow it up, put the insert in and then blow it up. Much easier. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: CoCoCates

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these ottomans and I love them! Easy to assemble and they look very nice outside. I’ve only had them about a week but so far so good no deflating. I Can easily slide them under my chairs, so if it gets a bit windy they will be safe. Great deal !
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for use as an ottoman on a cruise ship balcony
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use on our last 7-night cruise (on a Celebrity ship) as we had read that their balcony cabins didn't have a foot ottoman. It worked perfectly: it stayed inflated and was compact and light for packing when deflated. As we will likely just use it for such, I can't comment on durability. It does come with a hand pump that was pretty easy to use. Yes, it takes a little long to do, but big deal. To deflate, instead of using the pump, I just squeezed the valve and had my wife push moderately on the ottoman. For price and looks, I would definitely recommend for the purpose we used it for.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Not WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The weak pump broke within a minute of the pumping. The colors were also very faded & washed oyt looking. My 16 year old then started blowing it up like a balloon. We thought it was completely inflated, only to still need more air, which she had run out of. We put it in the casing & left it on the porch. Too weak & wobbly to prop feet on or place a drink on. Pethaps the stray cats in the neighborhood will enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Feeling a bit burned after this item lasted 34 days with very light interior use only. A slow leak developed initially, then after a couple days it became a fast leak, and then it looked like a pancake. Note: yes, I can patch it - but still, a month of use for the money is a bad deal imo. Pros: cover looks nice, seems of decent quality. Good proportions for our needs, maneuverable. Cons: inflatable interior piece made of super cheap material, leaks with even light, indoor use. Pump provided does not fit the valve on the inflatable portion, is effectively useless. Summary: cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best cheap alternative
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted an ottoman but did not feel like spending a ton of money on a 'real one'. This was the best alternative that I could have found. It's sturdy, and the cover looks great! It did take some effort and a bit of time to pump it up with the provided pump (since I don't have an electric pump) but worth it. I've only had to pump it up once and it doesn't seem to have lost any air, or any significant amount of air. And honestly, even when I have my feet on it, I don't think you can really tell it's inflatable so it could be put in just about any living room!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Scherer

customer_reviews.title: great seasonal ottoman
customer_reviews.text: We love these ottomans for the fact that come winter, we can deflate them, fold up and store easily. They are small and lower than most poufs, BUT perfect if you have deep seat chairs like we do. I bought two for me and two for my sister. My sister loved the red , white and blue pattern. We used a plug in air pump because the pump they supply you with is terrible. You could also just blow up yourself. Inflate a little with the nozzle on bottom, and then put cover on , inflate rest of the way and zip it up.. So easy. Not sure why people had trouble figuring that out. Kind of common sense.
customer_reviews.author: shannon h

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be holding up fine
customer_reviews.text: It's more comfortable than most upholstered ottomans, especially if you don't inflate it to the point of feeling "solid." If you have sensitive legs like mine, you probably notice that they start hurting after being propped up on something that's not really "cushie." This is great for sensitive legs. Just inflate it to about 80 percent. (But even when not completely inflated, it was kind of a battle to get it into the cover and lined up correctly. Still, I think it was worth the extra effort.
customer_reviews.author: MizTaffee

customer_reviews.title: Very low profile , attractive fabric
customer_reviews.text: These ottomans are attractive , easy to inflate and appear to be durable . They are however very low . If you have Anderondak type seating since they generally are low profile chairs they are OK . I kept them but would not buy them again . Also the company was unresponsive to questions and requests for cancelation .
customer_reviews.author: Grammashe

customer_reviews.title: Nice look and well made
customer_reviews.text: Although the pump that came with it is useless I was able to blow it up myself. Once it was almost fully inflated I put on the cover the completed inflating it and zipped the cover closed. So far it has help up well. I have two and they look great. They are just what I wanted for my deck but I bring them indoors for my grandchildren to sit on and to use as footstools. They’re very nice looking. Other than the fact that the enclosed pump doesn’t do anything they’re fine.
customer_reviews.author: IAB

customer_reviews.title: Inflation issues ruin this
customer_reviews.text: Ok seriously... I don’t know how anyone inflates this. I mean, I’m strong and athletic and it took me HOURS and my jelly arm is now useless. Looks good but I’d never buy again. I’d rather spend hundreds than hours manually inflating this. Oh and by the way - that’s not an exaggeration- HOURS.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ardito

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 99 year old Mother as she's been having trouble with swollen ankles and feet and the doc wanted her to elevate her feet while sitting. This is lightweight, east to move around and hopefully won't cause a fall hazard. So far she finds it easy to use, move about and keep out of harms way. Seems quite sturdy and well made. It did take a bit of effort to get it inflated with the enclosed pump. Pump could be a bit sturdier. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard W Perry

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman looks great on my front porch in front of an oversized wicker chair. It’s covered in a durable canvas, with an inner plastic liner. And it’s a good size, both height and width, and comfortable to use to prop up your feet while relaxing or reading. The pump works well, too. But remember it’s a foot pump. It doesn’t work well using your hand, but using your foot pumps it up easily and pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't blow it up all the way! 3/4th full only
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and the pattern is very beautiful. The reason I give it a low review is because there were no instructions. I blew it up and placed it in the cover. One side of the cover tore immediately so now it has a hole :( the trick is to blow up the ottoman only 3/4 so that the cover does not tear. I don't live in the country and waited for a friend to bring it to me so now I have a big hole and no way to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: G. C.

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable, included pump is pretty bad. Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: These look great BUT hard to inflate as the pump it comes with is pretty bad. To solve any sizing issues, once partially inflated, put it in the cover then finish inflating from there. However, these are not durable at all. Within 24 hours one has a hole somewhere and deflated. The other is slowly deflating as well within 72 hours. Unless you have an extremely smooth porchbor cement, do not recommend. I have a wood porch and speculate a splinter popped it.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: This was a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these and are pleased. I gave the item four stars instead of five because of the pump which is included. The pump is adequate but you have to use if for a long time to inflate the ottoman. I'll use my Coleman electric pump to inflate them in the future. The quality of the item is very good. We will use them when camping and expect them to allow us to more easily relax when sitting in our camping chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but do not waste your time with the included pump!!
customer_reviews.text: After fumbling with the pumps, I got frustrated, almost gave up, then remembered that I had brought my exercise ball back to house while working from home, so I used that put - inflated that within 2 mins. Make sure that you place the the black plastic thingy that must be inflated inside the outside cover prior to inflating, and smooth the edges as you inflate. I use indoors and on patio!
customer_reviews.author: La Bella

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the main purpose of propping my feet up while I'm out on the porch. These fit my decor perfectly. Before inflating them I placed the plastic tube inside the cover. That way I knew how much to inflate. On one I had accidentally done too much. The pump that is sent to you is to deflate and pump. I use these every day and they are so easy to move around. I'm so glad I got these and not a heavy, thick, foot ottoman. Try them out!
customer_reviews.author: PRISCILLA

customer_reviews.title: Love this ottoman!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!!! It’s perfect for my rocking chair on the front porch and it seems to stay dry!! Awesome value for the price 👍👍 Only bad thing is it took a while to arrive!! Advice- Inflate the bladder a little, then insert it in the cover and arrange it into the right position before you continue inflating...otherwise you’ll never get it inside the cover!!!! Very tight nice fit though.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as I pictured them. They are really cute, they are really functional, and they are easy to put together. It is an inflatable inside with a beautiful cover that works and matches perfect to my chairs. We have been spending more time at home and utilizing our porch as an oasis. These were a great addition and a much less expensive alternative to traditional footstools. I would buy these again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: EliNC

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I suppose it is my mistake that I did not realize it was inflatable. But considering the fact that it is I will say the pump that comes with it did not work well at all. We used our own small electric pump. I would advise you to put the balloon inside the casing first and then pump it up. I’m pretty happy.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good inflatable stool but a little short.
customer_reviews.text: Liked this little inflatable foot stool. Only thing is it's a little bit too short. Not quite couch height, and would be better if it was either wider for two people to use or more of a coffee table shape & height. Just a thought for the manufacturer. Otherwise work OK on a trip when we stayed somewhere with a small couch with no foot rest.
customer_reviews.author: yankeedoodle

customer_reviews.title: Great easy to use foot rest for patio
customer_reviews.text: We liked this so much we ordered a 2nd one for our patio. Easy to assemble, but much easier to inflate by mouth than using the pump. After 2 hours pumping air, we blew it up in 15 minutes. Didn't bother using pump on 2nd one. Very convenient to move around and get out of the way or put where you want it. Pretty colors matched our slate flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ottoman. It exceeded my expectations. One of the reasons I chose to buy from this company is because they were the only one who Included an air pump. And the pump worked great. I love the sturdy canvas weight fabric, and the red is true to color. I have it on a vinyl floor, so I put a small piece of non-skid stuff under it to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndy

customer_reviews.title: Great priced poof!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a poof to prop up my swollen pregnancy feet and WOWZA, they get expensive quick! Got this one and am very happy with it. Currently keep it under our chairs out on our front porch to pull out when I sit my keester down and it's great! I see it being a kid chair eventually too (a hefty adult may pop if they sit strait on it). The pumper upper was a bit challenging to get it to pump up the poof, so my husband ended up using his mouth for the last half. Great poof for the price, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Audrea Straub

customer_reviews.title: A Great Ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: I have knee problems, and this ottoman is great to stretch out my legs, when I am sitting outside on the deck. This is my second one - the cover finally wore out on the old one, but that was after years of letting it sit outside under the table all summer.. And they come in nice colors to match your deck furniture. Nice Product - Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Works for outdoor comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I found it difficult to inflate and had to get help from someone stronger. He had no trouble and it has stayed inflated. I use it outdoors on my patio for a footrest with a camping chair I can easily move to any location in my garden. It has served the purpose for which I purchased it and a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Older Reader

customer_reviews.title: Comfy foot rest
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted, a comfy place to put my feet up on the porch. I haven’t tried sitting in it but it makes a great foot rest. Easy to assemble (cover is a bit tricky to nail it’s in place). I take it in when I’m not using it because it’s light and could blow around in a strong wind. Easy to pick up by the side handle.
customer_reviews.author: P. Trafford

customer_reviews.title: that's how much I love this Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I order a lot from Amazon and this is my first review, that's how much I love this Ottoman!!! I bought it for our camper and love it so much I'm ordering another one for my patio. It is well made, easy to inflate with the included pump and it's really pretty! The fabric they use is very nice and doesn't look cheap at all. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kimberly k stringos

customer_reviews.title: Form and function
customer_reviews.text: Love these, bought 2. They are great for light weight patio ottoman. Seem sturdy enough for the job. Love the pattern I got, super cool. Lots of compliments. Would buy more. You have to blow up partially, then put inside fabric, very mildly challenging, wouldn’t take out a star for it.
customer_reviews.author: FXDawg

customer_reviews.title: It is cute, but arrived with a broken zipper.
customer_reviews.text: It's small and cute, and looks as pictured. However, it did arrive with a broken zipper. I guess I can make it work, but disappointing and makes me doubt it's durability. As you are inflating, be sure to keep adjusting the inner inflatable part to the shape of the ottoman or you'll end up with an uneven shape.
customer_reviews.author: RachelM

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile! Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Love the pattern and the versatility. Easy to move around wherever I want to use it. The other options I had my eye on were hundreds of dollars - for something that will stay outside, this is perfect! I’ve had it for more than a month now, use it daily and haven’t had to reinflate yet.
customer_reviews.author: Hollyskye

customer_reviews.title: Portable Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in a camper as our couch has no foot rest. This is very lightweight and storable. Cover is removable which will make it easy to clean. Included foot pump is usable but will take very long to fill. I will use a portable compressor to fill it quick.
customer_reviews.author: D. Valentine

customer_reviews.title: outdoor ottoman or extra seating
customer_reviews.text: What a find! I needed some foot support while reading in an adirondack chair on my back porch. This is the perfect height for that. They also make nice seating for when I have lots of people visiting! The fabric is good quality and the included foot pump is nice. One tip - put the cover on before you inflate all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these inflatable cushions a month and a half ago. A couple weeks ago one of them got a leak. Two days ago a second deflated. The two deflated ones also have fraying along the seam on top. Only one of them remains. Poor quality. It's a shame because they are so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, soft, affordable foot stool
customer_reviews.text: Great foot stool for outside or inside really. Appreciate that it has a handle so I can bring it inside easily if there are strong winds. Cover is removeable for washing which is nice. Good price for the value. I did rate the easy to inflate lower than my five star review for one reason...it is easy to inflate, just not with the pump that came with it. It seems wasteful to include the pump. I would prefer to choose whether I wanted the pump included or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this ottoman!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an affordable footstool for my outdoor furniture for years. I happened upon this one and decided to give it a try. I love it!!. The pump that came with it was useless but I blew it up fairly easily. It works great. Comfortable and looks nice with my patio furniture. Great product and value.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Conversi

customer_reviews.title: Love This
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted, we slide it under one of our chairs so that is doesn't blow away but could probably leave it out in normal weather and not worry about it. Looks like a pouf, not a blow up ottoman. Hasn't gotten too dirty so far sitting on our porch.
customer_reviews.author: NOBA

customer_reviews.title: Grey pattern
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting it to be so large but I am very pleased. Easy to assemble, a lot of room, and super affordable compared to buying one of those foam stuffed ones. I love the fact that you can wash the cover, and let the air out, fold it up, and put it away for storage instead of having a big puff that you can't do that with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I WANTED!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a small stool to go with my rocker on the front porch. Color was perfect, didn't want anything expensive that could be stolen. This stool works great. I used an electric air pump instead of the foot pump included. Sturdy enough to use as a seat too.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive- great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t comment on durability, but it looks good. There is actually an outdoor fabric cover that goes over the inflatable part, so it looks better than expected. It has enough give to use with my rocker. Just put it in the cover before completely inflating it.
customer_reviews.author: ellen sf

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Stylish
customer_reviews.text: It took me a couple of times to figure out the instructions but once I did, it was fine. These are so cool! I love them!! They’re very cute and they are high quality. Don’t bother using the pump, it’s easier to blow them up yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Goobercat

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, lightweight, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Even better than expected! Comfortable and (seemingly) durable. The weight limit is higher than I thought it would be, so if our great Dane steps on it, hopefully it won't burst! I also like how light they are, so moving them around is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay inflated for long.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it and also how comfortable it is once it is fully inflated. I don’t like that it constantly looses air. It did that from day one. This is annoying and it shouldn’t be that way. I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color and would not inflate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered navy blue and what arrived was grey. My husband and I both tried to inflate this and we couldn't with the pump or with our mouths. It is basically like a beach ball - I thought it would have some weighting to keep it from blowing away, but it doesn't. It was easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect on my deck.
customer_reviews.text: The tool they provide to inflate this isn't the best, but I just plugged away at it. Only took a few minutes. Definitely blow it up about half way and then insert it into the ottoman and finish. It looks super cute on my deck and love that you can adjust the firmness.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman is Comfy & Cute
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 & they're a perfect addition to my patio set. They're very comfortable to rest your feet on & can easily be tucked underneath the chair. It was easy to inflate with the pump it came with. Overall, I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Izziee-B

customer_reviews.title: Great ottoman!
customer_reviews.text: The pump was pretty much useless. I ended up blowing it up like a pool floaty. But I absolutely love this ottoman. The fabric cover seems durable. It is the perfect height for relaxing on the patio, and when I’m finished it slides perfectly under my chair!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Sad that i has to return one
customer_reviews.text: I love the Ottoman! I purchased two and one came defective. The inflatable was stuck together and had a hole. I wanted to re-order it. However, there’s not anymore in stock. I should have contacted the seller to see if they would ship another inflatable piece, so I could keep the cover. 🙁 I already sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for poolside
customer_reviews.text: I have this on my lanai by my pool. It withstands splashing and still looks good. Also, I will be able to remove the covering from the air bladder for cleaning. Looks more expensive than it is-- which makes me happy with this deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to inflate
customer_reviews.text: There must have been something wrong with the product because it was simply impossible to inflate. Yes I did follow the instructions!!
customer_reviews.author: K SPOMER

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, BUT THE BLOW UP DEVICE STINKS! My advice, go to the gas station blow them up a bit, then put cover on the finish the blow up. DO NOT USE THE DEVICE! Trust me you will not b pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy M Ripley

customer_reviews.title: Read the review first before you buy
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this ottoman 5 stars but it came with an inadequate pump and no instructions. So if you but this and I would suggest you do, then put the inner tube inside the cover before you pump it up. Also, use a more powerful pump. If I had been aware of this then I would definitely give it a 5!
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but does the job
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a bit overpriced. First of all I got the wrong color, secondly the air pump didn’t work so we ended having to blow it up ourselves. It does the job but I won’t be purchasing another.
customer_reviews.author: A~Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Inflating is impossible
customer_reviews.text: Inflating is basically impossible. Make the plastic easier to cut through so your cheap plastic hose nozzle can actually push through it.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I really like the quality, ability to inflate/deflate, washable cover, so light weight and allows me to put my feet up. I think I will invest in a electric air pump. It took me too long to air it up. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melodee L. Sellers

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: you get what you pay for, i suppose. while the outdoor ottoman seems to serve the intended purpose, the pump that came with it was incompatible with the product, so we ended up having to inflate it with our breathe (not very easy). overall, meh
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Porter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height and squishyness
customer_reviews.text: I love sitting by the backyard fire pit but it hurt my legs to prop them up on the hard stone. This ottoman is the perfect height and squishyness. But you do need to keep it out of the sun. I feel like it started to fade quickly.
customer_reviews.author: TrepMartinez

customer_reviews.title: How cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I have all my outdoor furniture on my deck and I needed an outdoor foot stool. This matched my furniture and it's just so darn cute. Took only a few minutes and it was all ready to go.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to blow up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to blow up, sturdy cover & with black bottom. Like the side handle, will make easier to carry. Planning to use outside on my deck, Haven't had a chance to use yet due to the weather.
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Love the fabric options!
customer_reviews.text: I used an electric pump to inflate because it was easier than using the pump that comes with it. I love this little foot rest, especially the print! So glad the company offers more than the colid colors.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: A FUN FOOTSTOOL
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty and fun. The pump is ok but you can blow it up faster with your mouth. Just pinch the opening together so you can get the air in. Love the design too!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Juma

customer_reviews.title: Soft on feet, perfect ottoman well made
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little ottoman. It is very well made. Very nice looking. Color lasts and is still strong under hot sun. I just blew up on my own, pump is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Cute but...
customer_reviews.text: The pumps that were sent along with the products were useless. But it’s not too hard to inflate manually. However once fully inflated it doesn’t fit into the cloth covering. And from a regular height deck chair, the Ottoman seems too low
customer_reviews.author: Bethfromnh

customer_reviews.title: what we needed for our terrace
customer_reviews.text: It definitely does the trick in terms of having something to rest our feet on. But quick word of advice, if you have an air mattress pump with different valve sizes, just use that to inflate it. The pump that it came with was flimsy and hard to use.. in my opinion. Other than that, im happy w/ this purchase
customer_reviews.author: siobhan

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: This ottoman is so cute! Perfect for our outdoor patio! It was super easy to inflate and put together. We take with us when we sit outside and then since it’s small enough we bring it back inside. It’s big enough for 2-3 people to fit their feet on top of. Want to get another for my mom since she loves it so much! I definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for something like this!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this outdoor ottomon! It’s very high quality, the fabric is nice and it is well made. It’s easy to pump up and very lightweight. I just ordered a second one. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: gretal99

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product! It comes with a foot pump to blow it up but, there isn’t a pre-made hole for the air to go through. I contacted the company directly and she suggested I prick a hole myself, I did that but it punctured the inter tube. The sales person even admitted that there were numerous complaints about this very thing. She asked me to take a picture and send receipt but I have yet to get a refund. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: S.O.S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Ottoman
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my purchase! Be sure to place the inflatable part into the cover BEFORE inflating it. It's a bright red, which is exactly what I was looking for. I live in an area that gets very windy, but it has handles so I attached a zip tie to it in order to secure it to my patio table. It isn't even noticeable and I don't have to worry about it blowing away. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Sharday

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT BUT>>>
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these little inflatable ottomans, I have one for my office and one for my porch. The pump sucks i mean really sucks...horriable. Other than that I they are prefect buy and a really good idea.
customer_reviews.author: Elis Miles

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on my outdoor balcony
customer_reviews.text: so easy to inflate, just make sure you place the actual portion to be blown up, inside of the cover before inflating (just makes it easier) I get so many compliments on it - It goes great with my pink patio chairs. Best part - you can remove the cover and wash. (I don't dry mine just to avoid any shrinkage - lay flat to dry) Super cute footrest and more sturdy than you would think. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Compact for my patio
customer_reviews.text: The pump doesn’t cut it but did it myself without passing out 😆 Perfect height, size, and it’s so lightweight! It’s perfect for my patio space.
customer_reviews.author: It’s Sunny in Boston

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: We bought one for our patio chairs in our small screened patio. Based on previous reviews and measurements listed, we thought we would only be able to fit one and have to share it, but it actually was smaller than I had pictured and we liked it so much that we ordered another one to have for our other patio chair.
customer_reviews.author: Daphne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: This thing is smaller than you think
customer_reviews.text: Read the DIMENSIONS! My wife bought this and it was too small for our outdoor sofa. Plus it deflated in like a week. Quickest product from shipping to trash I've bought in a loooong time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Myers

customer_reviews.title: very cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: this looks like it will stand up to some use and was easy to inflate -- though i didn't use the included manual pump but a small electric one i had on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F.

customer_reviews.title: Attractive but hard to inflate
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be of good construction materials. Pump was next to useless, tube failed to remain inserted in the valve and when it did pass air, the volume was very small. Easier to blow up using lungs. Basically a reshaped beach ball with durable case. May 2020
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Luv it!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my deck that was easy to move around and this fit the bill. It was reasonable cost and seems very sturdy. I’ve gotten a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Brande

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love this little ottoman! Pretty easy to inflate with the included pump. There is the inner part that is inflated and then the cover. I would recommend partially inflating the center and then putting on the cover. The cover will not fit if fully inflated. I bought this to be used on the patio and that's where it is right now. You do have to add air every once in a while but easy to do. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie George

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t stay inflated. I inflate it and it’s flat in under an hour every time. It’s super cute and would have been a perfect addition to my patio but it’s useless without being able to stay inflated. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: IMS

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: The covers are real material and durable. I find them too light weight but very comfortable to use on the legs. Nice purchase!
customer_reviews.author: TMC

customer_reviews.title: Have to return sue to leak
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a leak in it. Will have to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up & the print looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my patio. Don't get it too close to a fire source. Other than that, it's great for your feet or a plate - I'm not brave enough to try a cup yet!
customer_reviews.author: Steve R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cushion for everywhere !
customer_reviews.text: Great cushion for by the pool,sitting on the lawn or doing meditation. Perfect size, arrived on time, perfect condition. Getting the pump was a good idea and appreciated. Easy to setup, and saving the bag for winter storage. Happy Camper here! Big thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my patio
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and outer material is good quality and also the inner rubber felt strong It was easier to blow it up with my mouth then using the pump with tube which didn't Work.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our patio And it is such a nice little addition, I am very happy with it, it is easy to inflate and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two ottomans for my patio and they are gorgeous! Inflating them took a little bit of work but the foot pump was a great help. I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Foster

customer_reviews.title: Nice small inflatable foot rest.
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use in my parents rv. It will be great to use and be able to deflate while they travel on long trips.
customer_reviews.author: Speed Queen

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: Had a favorite chair that was just missing something. This did the trick, it stays in place and turned my favorite chair into an even better chair.
customer_reviews.author: BeMeSee

customer_reviews.title: good product but trouble with inflating
customer_reviews.text: great foot stool, just hard to get aired up inside bag, no instructions on how to inflate an put in bag cover.
customer_reviews.author: Stay n it

customer_reviews.title: great once inflated
customer_reviews.text: The ottoman is functional and better quality than I expected. The pump, however, is not so good. If you have a bicycle pump with an adapter, I recommend that over the flimsy plastic pump provided. It will get the job done but it's a pain to use. Overall happy with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Cory E. Grace

product_meta.title: Kozyard Inflatable Stool Ottoman Used for Indoor or Outdoor, Kids or Adults, Camping or Home(Red)
feature_bullets: PACKAGE INCLUDES 1 x Inflatable Stool (Grey, Quatrefoil Lattice) + 1 x Filling (25u, Thick PVC explosion-proof liner), 1x air pump. Soft Package with PVC handle bag. Great as a footstool or seat.
AIR PUMP FOR EASY INFLATING One easy-to-use inflating air pump is included, use your foot to operate the pump and inflate your stool.

EASY TO CARRY Very practical and convenient to carry, specially designed with double string piping and handle, zipper on the bottom of the ottoman, folded design for portability, solid and durable. Ideal for travel, home, etc.
SAFE DESIGN Safe for children at any age. Bears up to 260 pounds, coordinates with lounge chairs.
VERY DURABLE Upholstery fabric is 200gsm spun poly. Internal liner is 25U PVC material to ensure lasting durability. The upholstery fabric is very easy to clean and maintain.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars828 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
